about_the_game:
*NOTE* This pack is available in the in-game store under the Marketplace tab. You are strongly recommended to find the product there and make your purchase from within the game.

In order to be able to use this add-on livery product, you MUST first own the EWS & Freightliner Class 08s Loco Add-On. If you check in the in-game store it will verify if you own it before you purchase.

The Class 08 was the ‘go to’ locomotive for general purpose duties, with almost any shunting required in yards and at stations carried out by a ‘Gronk’. Over a ten year period from 1952, almost 1,000 models were built at British Railways’ Derby, Crewe, Darlington, Doncaster and Horwich Works, making it the most numerous of all BR classes.

This pack presents the Class 08 in its BR Blue livery and consists of two variations that represent a couple of configurations of toolboxes and so forth on the sides of the locomotives.

You must own the EWS & Freightliner Class 08s Loco Add-On before you will be able to use this add-on
detailed_description:
*NOTE* This pack is available in the in-game store under the Marketplace tab. You are strongly recommended to find the product there and make your purchase from within the game.

In order to be able to use this add-on livery product, you MUST first own the EWS & Freightliner Class 08s Loco Add-On. If you check in the in-game store it will verify if you own it before you purchase.

The Class 08 was the ‘go to’ locomotive for general purpose duties, with almost any shunting required in yards and at stations carried out by a ‘Gronk’. Over a ten year period from 1952, almost 1,000 models were built at British Railways’ Derby, Crewe, Darlington, Doncaster and Horwich Works, making it the most numerous of all BR classes.

This pack presents the Class 08 in its BR Blue livery and consists of two variations that represent a couple of configurations of toolboxes and so forth on the sides of the locomotives.

You must own the EWS & Freightliner Class 08s Loco Add-On before you will be able to use this add-on

name: BR Blue Class 08 Add-on Livery

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy BR Blue Class 08 Add-on Livery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor:Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512 MB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:6 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics:Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
